title: Sound On: Gun Control, Ukraine and Tom Cruise
itunes:title: Sound On: Gun Control, Ukraine and Tom Cruise
description:
Frank DeAngelis, Former Principal of Columbine High School, discusses President Biden's gun control speech and the legacy of preventing school shooting.

Daniel Fried, Former Ambassador to Poland, discusses the 100th day in Russia's war on Ukraine.

Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis discuss what congress will achieve on gun control and the success of Top Gun: Maverick

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
